sentences.en: Do every workout conservatively, but with a cocky attitude.
sentences.cn: 在每次高强度的训练时, 以自信的态度保存一些体力.

sentences.en: Hair should be conservatively colored and styled and kept clean, brushed and neat.
sentences.cn: 头发必须保持自然的颜色和样式并且保持洁净, 梳理整洁.

sentences.en: Hair should be washed regularly, neatly groomed, off the collar and maintained conservatively colored.
sentences.cn: 经常洗发, 头发梳理整齐, 不得超过衣领,保持自然的颜色.

sentences.en: He was conservatively dressed , very businessman, and with a hearty goodwill to match.
sentences.cn: 他的动作很稳健, 很有商人的气魄, 而且心地善良,待人热情.

sentences.en: In addition, CES may be valuable in the follow - up of patients with conservatively treated liver trauma.
sentences.cn: 除此之外, CES在对肝损伤保守治疗患者的随 访 检查中也是有价值的.

sentences.en: It is conservatively estimated that not less than half a million people died in the famine.
sentences.cn: 据保守估计,死于这场饥荒的人数不少于50万.

sentences.en: Opt instead for conservatively cut clothes in conservative colors.
sentences.cn: 选择式样、颜色保守的衣服.

sentences.en: Out of the 200 roles that were applied for, the submissions which were accompanied by a low-cut dress received 62 more interview offers than their more conservatively dressed counterparts.
sentences.cn: 最终提交的结果显示，在总共申请的200个职位中，相比于衣着保守的那名女性来说，穿低胸装的那名女性多得到了62个面试机会。

sentences.en: Out tof the 200 roles that were applied for, the submissions which were accompanied by a low-cut dress received 62 more interview offers than their more conservatively dressed counterparts.
sentences.cn: 最终提交的结果显示，在总共申请的200个职位中，相比于衣着保守的那名女性来说，穿低胸装的那名女性多得到了62个面试机会。

sentences.en: Patients treated conservatively should mostly wear braces or at least tapes during training and competition.
sentences.cn: 保守地对待的病人应该大概穿着支柱或者至少在训练和竞争期间以带子绑起.

sentences.en: She was always very conservatively dressed when we went out.
sentences.cn: 我们拍拖的时候，她总是穿得非常传统。

sentences.en: Simple urethral stricture may be managed conservatively by dilation or urethrotomy . However, urethroplasty may be required.
sentences.cn: 单纯尿道狭窄可用尿道扩张及尿道切开等保守法治疗, 但有时需行尿道成形术.

sentences.en: The selection committee plumped for the safe , conservatively inclined candidate.
sentences.cn: 选拔委员会选中那位稳健、有保守倾向的候选人.

sentences.en: They suffered losses conservatively estimated at $ 20 million.
sentences.cn: 他们遭受的损失保守估计达二千万美元.

sentences.en: Under superiority, under girder fine light the second half somewhat conservatively.
sentences.cn: 在优势之下, 柁嘉熹后半盘下得有些保守.

words.tran_cn: 保存；将…做成蜜饯；使守恒
